title: General: The planning, design and construction of any building shall be such as to ensure safety from fire
clause_text: General: The planning, design and construction of any building shall be such as to ensure safety from fire. For this purpose, unless otherwise specified in these Regulations, Fire Protection Chapter, National Building Code as amended time to time shall apply.
